channel.title: 1 Run Server Error
channel.description:
Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . .
How To Fix?

item.title: 1 Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Your run.bat is setup incorrectly.

Try (assuming you are using Project Insanity):@echo off title Run java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

You are most likely missing the -cp bin; part in your compiler, or you/the previous owner of the source has changed the serverâ€™s packaging.

Also try compiling aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

  1. perhaps incorrect path
  2. make sure you have the actual class
  3. try removing the class if you have it recompiling then playing

Read full topic
